snippet: New York by the Numbers: The Center for Migration Studies estimates the city was home to 750,000 of the nation's 11.7 million unauthorized immigrants in 2010, compared with 2.9 million in California, 1.6 million in Texas and 1 million in Florida.
abstract: New York by the Numbers: The Center for Migration Studies estimates the city was home to 750,000 of the nation's 11.7 million unauthorized immigrants in 2010, compared with 2.9 million in California, 1.6 million in Texas and 1 million in Florida.

headline.main: Fewer Illegal Immigrants in New York, Study Finds
